description: meta info used by the Vasp parser, all names are expected to start with x_vasp_

metaInfos.description: build date as string
metaInfos.name: vasp_build_date

metaInfos.description: date of last modification of the source as string

metaInfos.description: Determines whether the total local potential (file LOCPOT ) contains the entire local potential (ionic plus Hartree plus exchange correlation) or the electrostatic contributions only (ionic plus Hartree).
